text:
[[File:Kosovo in Balkans.png|thumb|right|250px|Kosovo in the Balkans]] [[File:Kosovo ethnic 2005.png|thumb|right|250px|Ethnic distribution of Kosovo]] '''Kosovo''' may refer to: * [[Republic of Kosovo]], partially-recognized state in the [[Balkans]] (2008) * [[Constitution of Serbia|Autonomous province Kosovo and Metohija according to the Constitution of Serbia 2006]] * [[Republic of Kosova]] (1991-2000), unrecognized secessionist state in the [[Balkans]] * [[United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo]] (1999-), in accordance with the [[United Nations Security Council Resolution 1244]] * [[EULEX|Kosovo and Metohija under EULEX administration]] (2009-), in accordance with the [[United Nations Security Council Resolution 1244]] * [[Kosovo District]], a district of [[Serbia]]
;Historical entities
* [[Kosovo Vilayet]], a former prefecture of the Ottoman Empire * [[Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija (1946-1974)]], a province of Serbia * [[Socialist Autonomous Province of Kosovo]] (1974-1990), a province of Serbia * [[Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija (1990â€“1999)]], a province of Serbia
;Other places
* [[Kosovo, Vidin Province]], Bulgaria * [[Kosovo, Kyustendil Province]], Bulgaria * [[Kosovo, Plovdiv Province]], Bulgaria * [[Kosovo, Shumen Province]], Bulgaria * [[Kosovo Dabje]], Macedonia * [[Kosovo, Kaluga Oblast]], Russia * [[Kosovo, Novgorod Oblast]], Russia * [[Kosovo, Tver Oblast]], Russia * [[Kosovo, Vologda Oblast]], Russia
